ring_add_limit: You can add challenges up to 10
ring_favorite_limit: You can add favorite challenges up to 4
ring_delete_challenge: Do you want to delete this challenge?
memo_note_back:
Are you sure you want to cancel the note taking?
(The content you are writing will not be saved)
memo_note_content: Write Note (Scroll up to change color)
memo_note_delete_msg: Do you want to delete this note?
sticker_delete: Do you want to delete this sticker?
schedule_edit_all: Edit All Selected Events For This Month
schedule_delete: Do you want to delete this event?
schedule_delete_all: Delete all selected events for this month
shop_my_backup_msg: Linking and Backing Up Your Account
shop_my_isExisted:
There is already information linked to this account.
Would you like to call?
(Current account will be deleted)
shop_my_delete_msg:
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
(App closes after deletion)
shop_my_apple: See you in the iOS version!
shop_theme_msg:
After closing the app,
you must restart it for the theme to be reflected
tutorial_ring_add: You can add your weekly challenges
tutorial_ring_card:
You can delete or add it to favorites by tapping icons
and you can change it by tapping the title
tutorial_check_date:
You can see your progress
and swipe left or right to see other week data
tutorial_check_check:
You can check the completion of your daily challenges in three ways
: Did, Did not, and Will not
tutorial_check_image:
The emoji below will change according to your achievement rate
and you can change emojis by tapping it
tutorial_monthly_btn: You can change the decoration and schedule mode
tutorial_monthly_sticker:
You can select a sticker by selecting the date
and delete it by pressing long
tutorial_monthly_schedule_meeting: You can update it by tapping and delete it by sliding left
